name: Angry Mama
description:
Game for MashUp Game Jam 2021
You are Mama, and your son has earned so many  bad marks, he's gone away from home.

You have to find him and throw a slipper on his head!

Play this platform where your guns are Rolling Pin and Slipper(Like a real Italian Mom).

Some levels are easy and others are very Difficult... Don't rage quit ;)
